name: medium_scrape_trending
description: Scrape trending articles from Medium. Returns the current trending/popular articles with title, author, publication, claps, and read time.

steps.label: Wait for trending page to load

steps.code: const articles = []; const articleEls = document.querySelectorAll('article, [data-testid="postPreview"], div[class*="postArticle"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(articleEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = articleEls[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h2, h3, [class*="title"]'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('a[data-testid="authorName"], a[rel="author"], [class*="author"] a'); const pubEl = el.querySelector('[class*="publication"] a, a[data-testid="publicationName"]'); const clapsEl = el.querySelector('[class*="clap"] span, button[data-testid="clap"] span'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, span[class*="date"]'); const readTimeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="readingTime"], span[class*="read-time"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/p/"], h2 a, h3 a'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="miro.medium"], img[loading]'); articles.push({ rank: i + 1, title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', publication: pubEl ? pubEl.textContent.trim() : '', claps: clapsEl ? clapsEl.textContent.trim() : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', read_time: readTimeEl ? readTimeEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } return { trending_count: articles.length, articles: articles, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: trending_data
steps.label: Extract trending articles
